Source.Name: kxmlrpcclient
Source.Description: This library contains simple XML-RPC Client support. It is a complete client and is quite easy to use. Only one interface is exposed to the world, kxmlrpcclient/client.h and of that interface, you only need to use 3 methods: setUrl, setUserAgent and call.
